title: Chipotle Sloppy Joes with Crunchy Coleslaw
directions: To prepare Crunchy Coleslaw, combine plain yogurt, mayonnaise, vinegar, pepper sauce and salt in small bowl. Add coleslaw mix and bell pepper slices; toss to coat. Season with black pepper, to taste. Refrigerate, covered, until ready to serve.

Heat large nonstick skillet over medium heat until hot. Add ground beef and onion; cook eight to ten minutes, breaking into 3/4-inch crumbles and stirring occasionally. Pour off drippings. Stir in catsup, corn, beans, tomato sauce, chipotle peppers and ground cumin; bring to a boil. Reduce heat; simmer 5 minutes, stirring often. Stir in cilantro, salt and black pepper.
Place beef mixture on bottom half of each bun; top with coleslaw. Close sandwiches.
ingredients: cup canned black beans, rinsed and drained thoroughly
1 to 2 teaspoons chipotle peppers in adobo sauce, minced
of a red pepper, sliced into strips 1/8-inch thick
